text: Lepetella postapicula is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lepetellidae. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Ross Sea, Antarctica, at a depth of 1890 m. ==References== * Engl W. (2012) Shells of Antarctica. Hackenheim: Conchbooks. 402 pp ==External links== * Antarctic Invertebrates: Lepetella postapicula Category:Lepetellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1990
title: Lepetella postapicula
